sentences.english: Thereafter, peace returned to Malan Mountain and Malan flowers blossomed everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 马兰山重新恢复了安宁，马兰花漫山遍野地开放。

sentences.english: Unfortunately the wolf demon had cheated little monkey of the pithy formula .
sentences.chinese: 但老狼已经从小猴口中骗取了马兰花的口诀。

definition: Bitter Cauliflower, 1954 socialist realist novel by Feng Deying 馮德英|冯德英[Feng2 De2 ying1] loosely based on Maxim Gorky's Mother, made into a 1967 film by Li Ang
